attributes.additional_details:
Create awareness of Ménière's Disease in Hospitals and General Practitioner Practices throughout the UK.

Have posters and flyers with information regarding Ménière's Disease in Ear Nose and Throat departments and better educate medical staff in those departments and in general regarding the symptoms of Ménière's.

Liaise with Ménière's sufferers and actually LISTEN to what they say, as current information on Ménière's disease is minimal and largely erroneous.
